text: Anyone have experience with the new Azure deployment config? Seeing weird errors.
Yeah, I ran into this last week. Try setting `enableDefaultIngress` to true.
That did the trick. Thanks, Ian!
Need someone to sanity-check this SQL migration before I run it.
Looks clean, just double-check the rollback logic.
Huge thanks to Ian for unblocking the deployment flow. Quietly crushed it again üëè
